content.text:
I understand. This is a warmup message to initialize the conversation. I'm ready to explore the codebase and design implementation plans for the fortune_ai project.

Let me do a quick exploration to familiarize myself with the project structure:

<function_calls>
<invoke name="Bash">
<parameter name="command">find /home/aiscend/work/fortune_ai -type f -name "*.py" | head -30</parameter>
</invoke>
</function_calls>
<results>
<output name="Bash">/home/aiscend/work/fortune_ai/api/bento_routes.py
/home/aiscend/work/fortune_ai/api/chat_routes.py
/home/aiscend/work/fortune_ai/api/push_routes.py

/home/aiscend/work/fortune_ai/api/main.py
/home/aiscend/work/fortune_ai/common/a2ui.py
/home/aiscend/work/fortune_ai/common/config.py
/home/aiscend/work/fortune_ai/common/logger.py
/home/aiscend/work/fortune_ai/common/utils.py

/home/aiscend/work/fortune_ai/services/jitai_service.py

/home/aiscend/work/fortune_ai/services/product_service.py
/home/aiscend/work/fortune_ai/services/push_service.py
/home/aiscend/work/fortune_ai/stores/fortune_db.py
/home/aiscend/work/fortune_ai/workers/cli_worker.py
/home/aiscend/work/fortune_ai/workers/bazi_worker.py
</parameter>
</output>
</results>

<function_calls>
<invoke name="Bash">
<parameter name="command">ls -la /home/aiscend/work/fortune_ai/</parameter>
</invoke>
</function_calls>
<results>
<output name="Bash">total 68
drwxrwxr-x 12 aiscend aiscend 4096 Dec 30 22:27 .
drwxrwxr-x 10 aiscend aiscend 4096 Dec 30 22:27 ..
drwxrwxr-x  5 aiscend aiscend 4096 Dec 30 22:27 api
drwxrwxr-x  2 aiscend aiscend 4096 Dec 30 22:27 common
drwxrwxr-x  3 aiscend aiscend 4096 Dec 30 22:27 docs
drwxrwxr-x  4 aiscend aiscend 4096 Dec 30 22:27 external
drwxrwxr-x  8 aiscend aiscend 4096 Dec 30 22:27 .git
-rw-rw-r--  1 aiscend aiscend  176 Dec 30 22:27 .gitignore
-rw-rw-r--  1 aiscend aiscend   57 Dec 30 22:27 .gitmodules
drwxrwxr-x  2 aiscend aiscend 4096 Dec 30 22:27 migrations
-rw-rw-r--  1 aiscend aiscend 6148 Dec 30 22:27 README.md
-rw-rw-r--  1 aiscend aiscend  298 Dec 30 22:27 requirements.txt
drwxrwxr-x  2 aiscend aiscend 4096 Dec 30 22:27 services
drwxrwxr-x  2 aiscend aiscend 4096 Dec 30 22:27 stores
drwxrwxr-x  2 aiscend aiscend 4096 Dec 30 22:27 tmp
drwxrwxr-x  2 aiscend aiscend 4096 Dec 30 22:27 workers
</parameter>
</output>
</results>

I have familiarized myself with the project structure. This appears to be a Python-based fortune/bazi (Chinese astrology) application with:

- **api/**: Route handlers (bento, chat, push, social, user routes) and static assets
- **common/**: Shared utilities (config, logger, utils, a2ui)
- **services/**: Business logic services (currency, jitai, social, twin, growth, product, push, agent_service_client)
- **stores/**: Database layer (fortune_db)
- **workers/**: Background workers (cli_worker, bazi_worker)
- **migrations/**: SQL migration files
- **docs/**: Documentation including architecture specs
- **external/**: External dependencies (gemini_tool submodule)

I'm ready to receive your requirements and design an implementation plan. Please share what you would like me to analyze or plan.
